TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PrivacyPolicyItem extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.Office.Server.UserProfiles.IPrivacyPolicyItem

Docs.summary: Provides methods and properties to add, delete, retrieve, set, change, and manage a privacy policy item.

remarks.para: The privacy policy specifies whether providing a value for a property is mandatory, disabled, or optional. Privacy policy is applicable only to user profile properties.

For more information about privacy policies, see Privacy Policies and Writing Policy-Compliant Code. For a code example about how to set the privacy policy of a property, see How to: Set Privacy Policies for User Profile Properties.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AllowPolicyOverride As Boolean
public: property bool AllowPolicyOverride { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns a Boolean value that specifies whether a privacy policy item is allowed to be overridden.
Docs.value: If a privacy policy item is allowed to be overridden, true; otherwise false.

remarks.para: For more information about privacy policies, see Privacy Policies and Writing Policy-Compliant Code. For a code example about how to set the privacy policy of a property, see How to: Set Privacy Policies for User Profile Properties.

abstract member Commit : unit -> unit override this.Commit : unit -> unit

Docs.summary: Commits changes made to a privacy policy item.

remarks.para: For more information about privacy policies, see Privacy Policies and Writing Policy-Compliant Code. For a code example about how to set the privacy policy of a property, see How to: Set Privacy Policies for User Profile Properties.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Server::UserProfiles::Privacy DefaultPrivacy { Microsoft::Office::Server::UserProfiles::Privacy get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Server::UserProfiles::Privacy value); };

Docs.summary: Gets and sets the default privacy policy for the privacy policy item.
Docs.value: The default privacy policy for the privacy policy item.

remarks.para: The default privacy policy limits the visibility of properties, users' My Documents, and other My Site content to:

For more information about privacy policies, see Privacy Policies and Writing Policy-Compliant Code. For a code example about how to set the privacy policy of a property, see How to: Set Privacy Policies for User Profile Properties.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UserOverridePrivacy { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UserOverridePrivacy : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Returns a Boolean value that specifies whether a user can change the privacy level to a level that is different than the default privacy policy level.
Docs.value: If a user can change the privacy level to a level that is different than the default privacy policy level, true; otherwise, false.

remarks.para: For more information about privacy policies, see Privacy Policies and Writing Policy-Compliant Code. For a code example about how to set the privacy policy of a property, see How to: Set Privacy Policies for User Profile Properties.
